reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Provision of life saving and preventive interventions for cholera and malnutrition crises in priority areas of Yemen

description.narrative: Prevenire il deterioramento della situazione nutrizionale in Yemen, mediante interventi salvavita e di prevenzione per il trattamento della malnutrizione acuta e severa nel Governatorato di Hajjah a favore dei bambini sotto i 5 anni e donne in gravidanza o allattamento, per una risposta integrata allo scoppio del colera.

The programme aims to address the deteriorating situation of malnutrition by addressing both the prevention and treatment of SAM as well as better integration of cholera response and nutrition services.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
